text: Two @EnvAgency #Wear field operation officers gave Maiden Castle flood bank in #Durham its final grass cutting of 2020. To ensure the flood banks are ready for inspection just in case we require access during a #flooding incident due to severe weather conditions #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/7GDSOyFKWE

RT @EnvAgencyNW: Would you know what to do if a flood was forecast in your area? 

If not, now‚Äôs the best time to get planning to avoid dam‚Ä¶

Not to mention 
@CityWestminster 
Concerns about evacuation risk from @EnvAgency 
@LDNGardensTrust 
Concerns about effect on World Heritage Site from @ICOMOSUK 

Have certainly forgotten many more. Please do add these below!
4/4

It‚Äôs #FloodActionWeek and the only reason I know that is because I am a student in this field. Makes me wonder if the message is actually getting out there to the general public 

@EnvAgency Prepare. Act. Survive https://t.co/w25LyF7ZmH

@WildStoke @StaffsUni @EnvAgencyMids @CraigBennett3 @WildTroutTrust In the 70's Causley Brook coming off Wetley Moor held some nice Brown Trout. I wonder if some of the Trent fish have parentage from there?
@severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids Thank you I have reported it. I came DM you but it is in Jackfield in Shropshire - hopefully something can be done about it üëçüèº

@amandabarwell @EnvAgencyMids Hi Amanda. If you suspect any fishing activity that is in breach of byelaws (e.g. out of season, illegal methods, taking fish outside permitted dates, etc) then you should always call the EA incident line: 0800 80 70 60 
If you can let us know where (DM if wish) we can raise too

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

Another week, another devastating pollution incident on the Bristol Frome. 

BART's work on the ground in the coming years will aim to address issues like these in the Bristol Frome catchment.

entity.name: The Simpsons
entity.description: This long-running animated comedy focuses on the eponymous family in the town of Springfield in an unnamed U.S. state. The head of the Simpson family, Homer, is not a typical family man. A nuclear-plant employee, he does his best to lead his family but often finds that they are leading him. The family includes loving, blue-haired matriarch Marge, troublemaking son Bart, overachieving daughter Lisa and baby Maggie. Other Springfield residents include the family's religious neighbour, Ned Flanders, family physician Dr Hibbert, Moe the bartender and police chief Clancy Wiggum.
